hometown: Da Lat, Lam Dong, Viet Nam
name: Van Wall

Content.summary: Currently Student at University of Science, the National University of Viet Nam.
I am a third year student, and i enjoy woking with machine more than working with human
Desire to have a job in order to develop and improve human life, from the smallest, closest things like daily-used device for example.
Can adapt to the new environment but also want a stable, comfortable one so working long-term at a certain company is prioritized.
I want to be doing in the field of software developer. My desire is to find a job matching capabilities, dreams and my own interests.
My foregign language is English, which i have TOEIC Trial Test 650 Certification (VACT) and also VNU - ept Certification (form National University of Viet Nam)

Content.detail: BGCP serves youth in grades Kâ€“12 at nine locations: three clubhouses and six school sites in East Palo Alto, Menlo Park, and Redwood City, where over half the youth drop out of high school. While most youth development organizations select the young people whom they serve, BGCP serves all youth. The organization has grown rapidly over the past five years and now serves 2,000 active members at its nine sites.
